levels.description:
Removes the invulnerability of [Crazelyseon, the Ascendant of Cosmoi] for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds;
<$ba.charged>Charged</> Effect: Extends the invulnerability removal effect to <@ba.vup>{enhance_duration}</> seconds, and additionally clears all [Seedbeds]
